Package com.pecs.pecsi

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Administration
    Policy Administration component (PAP)
    BlockchainSender
    Component for blockchain data preparation
    Decision
    Policy Decision component (PDP)
    EntryPoint
    Pre-configured entry point for PECSi Service (running the PECSi JAR)
    FtpUploader
    Utility class to upload new policies to blockchain FTP server
    Permissions
    Class to represent possible permissions that user can give
    Permissions.Data
    Android permissions specific permissions class
    Permissions.EngineData
    Engine data specific permissions class
    PermissionsChecker
    Java Runnable implementation of component responsible to perform Android permissions check rounds (case-specific PDP)
    PolicyBuilder
    Privacy Policy builder engine (XACML 3.0 compliant)
    PolicyList
    Object class to represent list of policies
    PolicyList.Policy
    Single policy object class
    PolicyValidator
    Privacy Policy validator engine
    Preferences
    Class to systematically represent user preferences
    Preferences.UserPreferences
    User preferences class
    Preferences.UserPreferences.AppSpecific
    App-specific preferences
    Preferences.UserPreferences.Global
    System-global preferences
    PresetChoice
    Utility class to represent preset chosen by user
    Presets
    Presets object class
    Request
    Class to represent data access request
    Request.AppPermission
    Applications permissions class
